title: The Zero Theorem 2013 BluRay.1080p.5.1.x264 . NVEE
description:
Quick note :
Please forgive unique resolution & black corners throughout,... Not my doing,... My physical Blu-ray is exactly the same, please do some research on reviews in regards. 
Director, Terry Gilliam framed this film with black borders & rounded corners to simulate camera gates found in old film projectors. While black corners are minimal, rounded corners are left untouched.
Even if you watch it in a Master Class Print, it'll be the same. This "resolution" is part of the film, these are not artifacts due to the encoding !
This is to maximize both content & quality, while leaving director's artistic intention intact.

Please seed to a Share Ratio of at least 1.1
If you require a torrent release I have posted in the past, not seeding,...
Please do not hesitate to inform me in any means you find fit to do so.
Torrent requests also "Always Welcome."
